menu_items.name: Chicken, Corn, Mushroom and cheese Quiche
menu_items.description: Quiche contains eggs.

menu_items.name: Sausage
menu_items.description: Stir fried in a tangy.

menu_items.name: Spagelette
menu_items.description: Fusion of spaghetti cheese & eggs.

menu_items.name: The Hotty
menu_items.description: Diced mushroom, potato and corn spiced to kill, served with lettuce, tomatoes, chopped onions, mayo and crisps.

menu_items.name: All American Cheese Burger Lamb
menu_items.description: Lamb with an additional cheese burst patty, served with lettuce, tomatoes, chopped onions, mayo and crisps.

menu_items.name: Great Dane
menu_items.description: A double hot dog topped with caramelized onions, gherkins, jalapenos and herb croutons.

menu_items.name: Hickeys On Toast
menu_items.description: Exotic veggies dressed with in house mayo, served on melba toast with with cheese.

menu_items.name: Hickeys On Toast Chicken
menu_items.description: Chicken chunks dressed with in house mayo, served on melba toast, grilled with cheese.

menu_items.name: London Mixed Grill
menu_items.description: Steak of chicken, minced lamb patty, sausage and chicken ham in a chilli garlic flavored tomato concasse topped with a fried egg sunny side up, served with mash potato and garlic bread.

menu_items.name: One Flew Over The Cuckoo's Nest Prawns (Fcuk)
menu_items.description: Skewered prawns glazed with a caramelized bourbon sauce served on a bed of creamy mashed potato and crunchy noodles accompanied with garlic bread and herb rice.

menu_items.name: Veg Green Thai Curry & Rice
menu_items.description: A spicy Thai curry with coconut milk, served with steamed rice.

menu_items.name: Ftyd (Fry Till You)
menu_items.description: Crispy fried veggies dressed with a tangy oriental sauce served on a moon of rice.

menu_items.name: Veg Spaghetti Pasta
menu_items.description: Sauce of garlic, tomato, basil and cream mixed with red sauce, sprinkled with parmesan cheese and garnished with jalapenos. Served with garlic bread.

menu_items.name: Italian Prawns Pasta
menu_items.description: A creamy sauce with garlic, fresh parsley, sundried tomatoes & grilled prawns.

menu_items.name: Buzz (Honey Buzz)
menu_items.description: The nectar of bumble bees combine with rich chocolate, accompanied by real honey comb.

menu_items.name: Oreo & Cookie Fudge (Chocolate Ice Cream)
menu_items.description: Scoops of vanilla ice cream and your selection of any on of the below toppings swirled together with an apprropiate toppings.

menu_items.name: Choco Mousse
menu_items.description: Hourless chocolate cake made with the finest dark chocolate & almonds sandwiched with chocolate mousse.

menu_items.name: Rainbow Granita
menu_items.description: Green apple and raspberry.

menu_items.name: Very Bery Blast
menu_items.description: Belgium blueberries blended with ice cream and topped with whipped cream.

menu_items.name: Frozen Hazelnut
menu_items.description: Espresso and doles hazelnut cream, blended with ice cream and topped with a scoop of vanilla.
